Translations.Text: When li proviz them their provisions li ej drink tas his frat bag tiam announcer anonc owners this karavan est thieves
Ili dir as ili ven them Ki vi perd
Ili dir Ni perd regx tas. Anyone returns gxi ricev ekstr camel-load; mi personally garanti this
Ili dir DI vi kon plen put ni ne ven here commit evil nor est ni thieves
Ili dir Ki est punishment thief se vi est liars
Ili dir punishment gxi trov his bag est ti thief aparten al vi! Ni tiel pun kulp

Li tiam started inspekt their uj getting his frat uj li ekstrakt gxi his frat uj! Ni tiel perfekt scheme Joseph; li ne kept his frat li aplik regx legx. Ke est vol DI. Ni exalt whomever ni choose alt rang. Super cxiu knowledgeable unu tie est unu est eben knowledgeable
Ili dir li sxtel tial did frat de his en des preter, Joseph concealed his feelings en ne don them any clue Li dir (al Vi est really mav. DI est fully aware da your accusations)
Ili dir O vi nobl unu li patr hav est elderly vi sorb unu de us his met? Ni seg vi est kind hom
